content:
Just finished building my first React Native app with Expo! ðŸš€

The developer experience is incredible. Hot reload, easy deployment, and native features work seamlessly.

If you're thinking about mobile development, give it a try!

Hot take: Composition over configuration is the secret to maintainable codebases.

Stop adding more props to your components. Break them down into smaller, focused pieces instead. ðŸ§©

Finally shipped dark mode support! ðŸŒ™âœ¨

Used CSS variables with Tailwind and it was a breeze. Everything updates automatically when users toggle themes.

No more maintaining separate stylesheets!

TypeScript tip of the day:

Use `ComponentProps<typeof Component>` to extract prop types from existing components.

No more duplicating type definitions! ðŸŽ¯

Spent the whole day optimizing our app's performance.

Result: 40% faster load times! âš¡

Key wins:
- Lazy loading images
- Memoized components
- Better list virtualization

Small changes, big impact.
